title: Green Peace
sinopse:
Kosakabe Chihiro goes to an agricultural high school. In this boys school, he makes Kawana Ginji, who is interested in him, into his errand-boy, but that guy suddenly stoles his first kiss ! Also one day, after skipping morning duty, Kawana with an unusual atmosphere locks him up in the shed ...!? What the real face of the farm-otaku Kawana !?

(Source: MU)
